title: Potkalinje, Krupa na Uni
text:
Potkalinje () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">municipality</a> of <a href="Krupa%20na%20Uni">Krupa na Uni</a>, part of the <a href="Republika%20Srpska">Republika Srpska</a> entity of <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>.
Before the <a href="Bosnian%20War">Bosnian War</a>, the entire town of Potkalinje was part of the <a href="Bosanska%20Krupa">Bosanska Krupa</a> municipality, but after the <a href="Dayton%20Peace%20Agreement">Dayton Peace Agreement</a> one part of the inhabited area became a part of municipality <a href="Krupa%20na%20Uni">Krupa na Uni</a>, divided by the <a href="Inter-Entity%20Boundary%20Line">Inter-Entity Boundary Line</a>.
Demographics.
According to the 2013 census, its population was 8, all Serbs.
